pr_title: HDDS-3042. Support running full Ratis pipeline from IDE (IntelliJ)

timeline.message: HDDS-3042. Support running full Ratis pipeline from IDE (IntelliJ)
remove environment variable required for isolated tests

timeline.bodyText: Some setup may not have JRE 13. Should we keep JDK8 as a minimum supported Java version that is common on Mac Dev box?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@

+<component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager">
+  <configuration default="false" name="Datanode2" type="Application" factoryName="Application">
+    <option name="ALTERNATIVE_JRE_PATH" value="13" />

replies.bodyText: Good point. Those lines seem to be optional. I removed them...
replies.author: elek
